comments.creator: reaalfantasy@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101206 Ubuntu/10.10 (maverick) Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101206 Ubuntu/10.10 (maverick) Firefox/3.6.13

When i try to drag a div (with css== style="width:80px;height:80px;background:(some_image);" ) to a new tab, like when you drag a image to a new tab and after you leave the mouse button it will open this image in new tab. but when i try this with div, i get alert error: "ASSERT: In the drop event, at least one mime-type should match our supported types
Stack Trace: 
0:_onDrop([object DragEvent])
1:ondrop([object DragEvent])
"

Reproducible: Always
comments.author: reaalfantasy@gmail.com
